snippet.title: Chants of Sennaar - Release Date Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Embark on a colorful and poetic journey with ancient languages to decipher in our new indie puzzle adventure gem. 

Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1931770/Chants_of_Sennaar/?utm_campaign=COS_ReleaseDateReveal&utm_medium=description&utm_source=YouTube

Unveil mysteries behind the fragments of the past

Divided since the dawn of time, the Peoples of the Tower no longer speak to each other. But it is said that one day, a Traveler will find the wisdom to break down the walls and restore the Balance. Explore and discover an enthralling world in a colorful, poetic setting inspired by the myth of Babel, where men have forgotten their past. Travel the endless steps of a prodigious labyrinth, uncover an ominous truth and unveil the mysteries of this fascinating city where ancient languages are both the lock and the key. 

Embark on a captivating journey with ancient languages to decipher when Chants of Sennaar releases September 5. Wishlist now for PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch and PC.
